interstellar.title: Interstellar
interstellar.synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.synopsis: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

inception.title: Inception
inception.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
